# MAVE Valuation Review

This document lists the calculated values for all stations across all events using the current formula.

## Formula
`Value = Round( (10000 / BallRarity) * Sqrt( (1 / EventRarity) * (365 / EventDuration) ) )`

## Event Multipliers
| Event ID | Name | Rarity | Duration | Multiplier |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| none | 無活動 (預設) | 1 | 365 | 1.0000 |
| shiny | 色違 | 0.000488 | 365 | 45.2679 |
| night | 末班車 | 0.001953125 | 365 | 22.6274 |
| xmas | 耶誕節 | 0.25 | 7 | 14.4420 |
| sfd | 軟體自由日 | 0.9 | 7 | 7.6116 |
| pride | PRIDE | 0.25 | 30 | 6.9761 |
| moon | 中秋節 | 0.15 | 14 | 13.1837 |
| dragon | 端午節連假 | 0.55 | 3 | 14.8732 |
| mother | 母親節 | 0.2 | 14 | 11.4174 |
| anniv | 中和新蘆線全線通車12週年紀念 | 0.629 | 7 | 9.1048 |
